amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt Form CRS, a disclosure document from the bill's investor testing requirements.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-237 to exempt Form CRS, a recently developed disclosure document that went through SEC investor testing, from the bills investor testing requirements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 229 (Roll no. 561).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Huizenga.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 229 (Roll no. 561).
